⚙️ System Requirements

Platform Minimum Version
iOS / iPadOS iOS 26 Beta
macOS macOS 26 Beta
tvOS tvOS 26 Beta

Note: An Apple Developer Account may be required for installation on some platforms.

📦 Previous Versions

All previous releases are available on our GitHub Releases page. You can find older builds and review changelogs there.

MKS-IPTV-App

The ultimate IPTV experience for Apple devices. Built with Swift 6 and SwiftUI for iOS, macOS, and tvOS.

v1.0-beta Built with ❤️ for Apple Ecosystem
